q: the field or off. Especially off. Along with the Eagles' own Michael Vick , Ben Roethlisberger was the other big redemption story in the NFL this year. That is, if you define redemption as making people forget your shameful past by winning football games. He may not be any better a guy, but it is time to acknowledge that Ben Roethlisberger is one of the truly elite quarterbacks in the NFL. He isn't an artist like Peyton Manning , Tom Brady , or

Rep. Mike Pence arrived at Columbus in his east-central Indiana district for a town hall meeting, the sort of event that usually attracted a few dozen constituents. Surprised to see the hallway outside the room crowded with people, their arms folded and brows furrowed, Mike Pence shouted down the hall to an aide, asking him to get a janitor to open the room. Senior Vice President Satya Nadella to president of Microsoft's Server and Tools Business. ''We're already making strong traction across our Server and Tools Business by embracing cloud services,'' said Microsoft Chief Executive Officer Steve Ballmer . Satya Nadella has deep experience in both our server business and online services, which will help accelerate our momentum while setting the course to deliver the cloud computing scenarios of the future. As president of the Server and Tools Business, Satya Nadella will oversee the overall strategy, engineering, marketing and product development for Microsoft's server, tools and cloud platform efforts. Eric Schmidt is stepping down as CEO of Google, and Larry Page is taking over the company just announced in its earnings release. Eric Schmidt will become Executive Chairman focused on, deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships, government outreach and technology thought leadership, the company says.
